2016 WW47 Purley-FPGA Server SKX/LBG B-Stepping Silver Release Announcement (BKC #6)

\n \n \n

DEG Platform Integration Team

\n \n
\n

The DEG platform Integration team announces the release of 2016 WW47 Purley-FPGA Server SKX/LBG B-Stepping Silver release package for Intel internal use. The release is based on OS of\n \n Linux\n server. The auto-installer packages are available on the Artifactory server (both SH site and OR site). Any questions please contact Bei, Ling.

\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n
Auto InstallerSH Artifactory ServerOR Artifactory Server
LinuxWithoutOS_BKC-PurleyFPGA_BkcLinux_56.106204-2016WW47.zip\n \n
RHEL7.2x86_64.zip\n 		WithoutOS_BKC-PurleyFPGA_BkcLinux_56.106204-2016WW47.zip\n \n
RHEL7.2x86_64.zip\n
\n

*Note: Please select the server which is closer to your region to get the better data accessing/downloading performance

\n
\n\n
\n
\n   Summary \n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n \n \n \n \n \n \n
\n

Test Result:

\xc2\xb7       Finish\nBKC test execution on RHEL 7.2. Please visit HPQC for test details. Refer to the installation guide for the BKC package installation

 

\xc2\xb7       Purley FPGA (RP Board: Neon City FPGA)

o  \nTotal test cases: 14; Passed test\ncases is 14 and pass rate is 100%. 

o  \nTest coverage:  

\xc2\xa7     SKX-FPGA B0 VIS/LBG B1: Run full BKC test case, P&P and Power cycling test.

                          
Sighting Update:

\xc2\xb7       Key\nSightings:

  • 5345552 [2016_WW46 BKC][BIOS 108.D11][P&P][Neon City FPGA] Mlc Local all read memory peak Bandwidth decreased 13.74% (from 182.9 GB/s to 157.6 GB/s )
  • 5345474 [2016_WW43 BKC][BIOS:105_D11][Neon city FPGA] There would be a caterr and then reset when running the reboot stress test.

\xc2\xb7       Open Sighting details can be found here; Full sighting list can be found in HSD

\n
\n   HW Rework \n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n \n \n \n \n
\n

Key Workaround (detail guide is here)

\n\n

\xc2\xb7        \nPlease use PCIe Video card instead of onboard BMC video due to\nknown BMC issue

\n\n

 

\n\n

Pedigree and Board Jumper Settings: guide

\n\n

Note:\nOnly mandatory and necessary optional rework is implemented by BKC team

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework FPGA JTAG chain missing CPU1\nTCK resistor

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework to replace FPGA KR RX AC Caps

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework add a pull down to RSMRST

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nMandatory rework to update VR FW

      CPLD updates to address IFWI issue with 2 SKX FPGA CPUs populated

\n\n

\xc2\xb7       \nRequired CPLD updates to address reset and FSC\nissues

\n \n
